description.p: Everything in one place Front isnâ€™t just for email. It brings all of your external messages -- emails to support@ or sales@, plus Twitter, Facebook Messenger, chat, and SMS -- into one unified inbox.
Front takes out the pain of team inboxes and enables you to scale your customer support, your hiring, your sales and more.
